## Stuff used to be free

### Jira

-   The format of Make that I implemented integrates with Jira's time tracking, but this is also no longer free for a solo mortgage-payer.

### K6

-   Added the tests to K6 Cloud, but this like everything else during a recession costs $ now, and I got booted off the FREE tier (SIGHS in capitalism)
